doc.field: Series XV. Audiovisual Materials, 1958-2008 and undated
Series XV. Audiovisual Materials, 1958-2008 and undated

Box of VHS and Beta: 1 VHS tape (transfer of 1950 Loretta Young promotional film); 11 Betacam SP tapes numbered 1-11 and labeled "NY Foundling Hospital Raw Footage"; 1 Sony Beta BCT-20K tape (numbered 1 of 11) dated 1987 April 27
